synopsis.text:
His father's mysterious disappearance and subsequent discovery in ancient ruins propel Junki Saiga into a world beyond his wildest dreams. As a typical high school student with a knack for mathematics, Junki finds his mundane life upended when he stumbles upon a golden bracelet during an investigation into his father's last whereabouts.

Simultaneously, an extraterrestrial entity descends upon Earth, wreaking havoc and destruction in its wake. In an unexpected turn of events, Junki becomes the chosen pilot of Reideen, a colossal golden mechanical giant, tasked with fending off the alien menace.

Now, Junki must navigate the delicate balance between his everyday high school life and his newfound responsibility as the sole defender against otherworldly threats. As he dons the golden bracelet, the question remains: Will this extraordinary power bring him honor or dread? Join Junki in his thrilling journey of self-discovery, camaraderie, and human drama as he battles to protect Earth from the unknown.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
